sn55.5:1.1: Atha kho ayasma sariputto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam sariputtam bhagava etadavoca:
sn55.5:1.4: “Sappurisasamsevo hi, bhante, sotapattiyangam, saddhammassavanam sotapattiyangam, yonisomanasikaro sotapattiyangam, dhammanudhammappatipatti sotapattiyangan”ti.
sn55.5:1.6: Sappurisasamsevo hi, sariputta, sotapattiyangam, saddhammassavanam sotapattiyangam, yonisomanasikaro sotapattiyangam, dhammanudhammappatipatti sotapattiyangam.
sn55.5:2.3: “Ayameva hi, bhante, ariyo atthangiko maggo soto, seyyathidam—
sn55.5:2.4: sammaditthi, sammasankappo, sammavaca, sammakammanto, sammaajivo, sammavayamo, sammasati, sammasamadhi”ti.
sn55.5:2.6: Ayameva hi, sariputta, ariyo atthangiko maggo soto, seyyathidam—
sn55.5:3.3: “Yo hi, bhante, imina ariyena atthangikena maggena samannagato ayam vuccati sotapanno, svayam ayasma evamnamo evangotto”ti.
sn55.5:3.5: Yo hi, sariputta, imina ariyena atthangikena maggena samannagato ayam vuccati sotapanno, svayam ayasma evamnamo evangotto”ti.
